login.bad_credentials: Something went wrong, please make sure you have used the correct account information.
login.title: Log in
login.welcome:
### Welcome to Language Depot!
\
Language Depot is a hosting service for [FieldWorks (FLEx)](https://software.sil.org/fieldworks/), \
[Language Forge](https://languageforge.org/), [OneStory Editor](https://onestory.org/) and [WeSay](https://software.sil.org/wesay/) projects. \
It is provided as a service to language communities by [SIL Language Technology](https://software.sil.org/) and \
the [Linguistics Institute at Payap University](https://li.payap.ac.th/) in Chiang Mai, Thailand.

reset_project_modal.confirm_downloaded: I confirm that I have downloaded the backup file and verified that it works. I am ready to completely reset the repository history.

reset_project_modal.confirm_project_code_error: Please type the project code to confirm reset

get_project.instructions:
### To load the project into{type, select, FL_EX { } other { (e.g.) }}FLEx
\
1. In the "Send/Receive" menu click "Get Project from colleagueâ€¦"
\
1. In the "Receive project" dialog box, click "Internet"
\
1. In the "Get Project From Internet" dialog box, enter your "Login" and "Password" for Language Depot and click "Log in"
\
1. In the "Project ID" field that appears, select "{code}"
\
1. Enter a "Name for the folder on your computer" (e.g. "{name}")
